title: Almost all the pixels on my phone died.
content:
I'm not 100% sure what is going on with my phone. The model is a pixel 2 and it was performing perfectly despite me dropping it and giving it a pretty bad crack. Nothing got in but pretty much all the pixels died at once except a line. It has improved I would say about half of the pixels are semi back but what should I do?

Update: It turned off for a bit and now it's more like 40% of the pixels are semi back
